character.name: Giant Poisonous Snake
character.bio:
Actions

Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-NAqy7W7STkaX0HtPJOu_description
attribs.current: The target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking the poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
